meanings.sent1: The owner of the toy was happy to share it with his friend.
meanings.sent2: The owner of the house takes good care of the garden.
meanings.sent3: The owner of the bakery accidentally baked a giant cookie.
meanings.sent4: She was the owner of a heart full of kindness.
meanings.sent5: The owner of the antique shop had a keen eye for valuable items.

meanings.definition: One who has the legal or rightful title to something
meanings.sent1: The car owner parked in the designated spot.
meanings.sent2: The land owner decided to build a new fence around the property.
meanings.sent3: The book owner accidentally dropped the novel in the bathtub.
meanings.sent4: She was the owner of the winning lottery ticket.
meanings.sent5: The owner of the company made important decisions for its future.
